alert.note: Alert for Buffalo (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 12:29AM CDT until June 29 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BUFFALO COUNTY... At 1227 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Independence, or 9 miles southeast of Mondovi, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. Very frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Gilmanton, Mondovi Airfield and Lookout. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
